### IPromptPlusConfig.ProgressBarWidth property
</br>


#### Gets Sets the width of the Progress bar.Default value is 80. Valid range is 10–255; values outside the range are coerced to the nearest boundary.

```csharp
public byte ProgressBarWidth { get; set; }
```
